mapper.select: SELECT pe.user_id userId, pe.job_number jobNumber, pe.user_name userName, pe.dept_id deptId, pe.gender, pe.nation, pe.phone, pe.duties_id dutiesId, pe.technical_id technicalId, pe.position_id positionId, pe.education_id educationId, pe.identity_ard identityArd, pe.fixed_telephone fixedTelephone, pe.entry_date entryDate, pe.birthdate, pe.quit_date quitDate, pe.positive_dates positiveDates, pe.user_state userState, pe.hukou_type hukouType, pe.staff_native staffNative, pe.identity_ard identityArd, pe.address, pe.attendance, pe.marriage, pe.occupational, pe.age, pe.specialty, pe.emergency_phone emergencyPhone, pe.emergency_user emergencyUser, pe.present_address presentAddress, pe.education_id educationId, pe.school_by schoolBy, pe.payroll_bank payrollBank, pe.bank_card bankCard, pe.user_img userImg, pe.education_undergo educationUndergo, pe.filiality_fine_card filialityFineCard, pe.filiality_fine_bank filialityFineBank, GROUP_CONCAT(pp.id) id, GROUP_CONCAT(pp.parameter_name) parameterName FROM jr_personnel_archives pe LEFT JOIN jr_archives_parameters ap ON (pe.user_id = ap.archives_id) LEFT JOIN jr_personnel_parameters pp ON pp.id = ap.parameters_id WHERE pe.user_id = #{userId}
